derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English gāt 'nanny goat', of Germanic origin; related to Dutch geit and German Geiss, also to Latin haedus 'kid'

entry.def: A goat is a farm animal or a wild animal that is about the size of a sheep. Goats have horns, and hairs on their chin which resemble a beard.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous agile ruminants related to sheep but having a beard and straight horns
2. a victim of ridicule or pranks
